name: Coffee
preparation: Step 1: Grind coffee beans to a fine consistency.
Step 2: Boil water and let it cool slightly (around 90°C).
Step 3: Add ground coffee to a filter or French press.
Step 4: Pour hot water over the coffee grounds and let it steep for 4-5 minutes.
Step 5: Press the plunger (if using a French press) or let the coffee drip through the filter.
Step 6: Add milk and sugar to taste, if desired.
Step 7: Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Tea
preparation: Step 1: Boil water in a kettle or pot.
Step 2: Add tea leaves to a teapot or infuser.
Step 3: Pour hot water over the tea leaves and let it steep for 3-5 minutes.
Step 4: Add milk and sugar to taste, if desired.
Step 5: Strain the tea into a cup.
Step 6: Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Lemonade
preparation: Step 1: Squeeze fresh lemons to extract the juice.
Step 2: Dissolve sugar in a small amount of warm water to make a simple syrup.
Step 3: Mix the lemon juice and simple syrup in a pitcher.
Step 4: Add cold water and stir well.
Step 5: Add ice cubes to the pitcher or serving glasses.
Step 6: Serve chilled and garnish with lemon slices or mint leaves.

name: Hot Chocolate
preparation: Step 1: Heat milk in a saucepan over medium heat.
Step 2: Add cocoa powder and sugar, stirring until dissolved.
Step 3: For a richer flavor, add chopped chocolate and stir until melted.
Step 4: Pour the hot chocolate into a mug.
Step 5: Top with whipped cream or marshmallows, if desired.
Step 6: Serve hot and enjoy!

name: Smoothie
preparation: Step 1: Chop fresh fruits into small pieces.
Step 2: Add the fruits, yogurt or milk, honey or sugar, and ice to a blender.
Step 3: Blend until smooth and creamy.
Step 4: Pour into a glass and serve immediately.
Step 5: Optionally, garnish with fresh fruit or a drizzle of honey.

name: Milkshake
preparation: Step 1: Add milk, ice cream, and flavoring (e.g., chocolate syrup or fresh fruits) to a blender.
Step 2: Blend until smooth and creamy.
Step 3: Pour into a glass and top with whipped cream, if desired.
Step 4: Serve chilled with a straw and enjoy!

name: Iced Tea
preparation: Step 1: Boil water and steep tea bags for 5-7 minutes.
Step 2: Add sugar and stir until dissolved.
Step 3: Let the tea cool to room temperature, then refrigerate.
Step 4: Serve over ice and garnish with lemon slices, if desired.

name: Mojito
preparation: Step 1: Muddle fresh mint leaves, lime wedges, and sugar in a glass.
Step 2: Add ice to the glass.
Step 3: Pour soda water and white rum (if using) into the glass.
Step 4: Stir gently and garnish with a sprig of mint.
Step 5: Serve chilled and enjoy!

name: Popcorn
preparation: Step 1: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Step 2: Add popcorn kernels and cover the pot with a lid.
Step 3: Shake the pot occasionally until the popping stops.
Step 4: Remove from heat and transfer the popcorn to a bowl.
Step 5: Season with salt and melted butter, if desired.
Step 6: Serve immediately and enjoy!

name: French Fries
preparation: Step 1: Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips.
Step 2: Soak the potato strips in cold water for 30 minutes to remove excess starch.
Step 3: Heat oil in a deep fryer or pan to 175°C (350°F).
Step 4: Dry the potato strips and fry them in batches until golden brown.
Step 5: Drain on paper towels and season with salt.
Step 6: Serve hot with ketchup or your favorite dipping sauce.

name: Samosa
preparation: Step 1: Prepare the dough by mixing flour, oil, and water.
Step 2: Boil and mash potatoes, then mix with peas and spices for the filling.
Step 3: Roll out the dough and cut it into small circles.
Step 4: Fill each circle with the potato mixture and fold into a triangular shape.
Step 5: Heat oil in a pan and fry the samosas until golden brown.
Step 6: Serve hot with chutney or sauce.

name: Nachos
preparation: Step 1: Arrange tortilla chips on a baking sheet.
Step 2: Sprinkle shredded cheese over the chips.
Step 3: Add jalapeños and bake in the oven until the cheese melts.
Step 4: Top with salsa, guacamole, and sour cream.
Step 5: Serve immediately and enjoy!

name: Spring Rolls
preparation: Step 1: Prepare the filling by stir-frying vegetables and noodles with seasonings.
Step 2: Place a spoonful of filling on a spring roll wrapper and fold into a roll.
Step 3: Heat oil in a pan and fry the spring rolls until crispy and golden brown.
Step 4: Drain on paper towels and serve hot with dipping sauce.

name: Momos
preparation: Step 1: Prepare the dough by mixing flour and water.
Step 2: Finely chop cabbage, carrots, onion, and garlic for the filling.
Step 3: Roll out the dough and fill each circle with the vegetable mixture.
Step 4: Steam the momos in a steamer for 10-12 minutes.
Step 5: Serve hot with spicy chutney or dipping sauce.

name: Onion Rings
preparation: Step 1: Slice onions into rings and separate them.
Step 2: Dip the rings in flour, then beaten egg, and finally breadcrumbs.
Step 3: Heat oil in a pan and fry the onion rings until golden brown.
Step 4: Drain on paper towels and season with salt.
Step 5: Serve hot with ketchup or your favorite dipping sauce.
